project_descr: Soutien à la Sécurité Publique et à la Transition en Tunisie.

outputs.output_descr: Le projet vise à renforcer les mécanismes nationaux pour une prévention, gestion et réponse aux crises effectives.
The project aims at supporting the Ministry of Interior (MoI) in enhancing the accountability and responsiveness of security institutions and the security forces.

The project aims at supporting the Ministry of Interior (MoI) in developing community led policing initiatives, implementing the new community policing policy and improve local police and national guard stations.
Strenghthening community security in Tunisia by scaling up the community policing approach engaged in 2014.
donor_name: US Department of State, Office to monitor  combat Tracking in persons.
The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and development - Canada
